title_teim: The eighteenth annual induction ceremony. 2003. The Police rehearsal. Reels 1-4.
title_ssm: The eighteenth annual induction ceremony. 2003. The Police rehearsal. Reels 1-4.
title_si: The eighteenth annual induction ceremony. 2003. The Police rehearsal. Reels 1-4.
alternative_title_teim: 18th annual induction ceremony. The Police rehearsal. Reels 1-4.
alternative_title_ssm: 18th annual induction ceremony. The Police rehearsal. Reels 1-4.
summary_teim: The Police rehearsing for their performance at the eighteenth annual induction ceremony. Band talking between rehearsal. Songs include: Roxanne, Message In A Bottle, I'll Be Watching You.
summary_ssm: The Police rehearsing for their performance at the eighteenth annual induction ceremony. Band talking between rehearsal. Songs include: Roxanne, Message In A Bottle, I'll Be Watching You.
contents_teim: Andy Summers tuning guitar -- Stewart Copeland warming on drum kit -- Summers talking to off-screen crew -- Sting enters rehearsal space greeting crew, Summers and Copeland -- Roxanne (The Police) -- Message in a bottle (The Police) -- I'll be watching you (The Police) -- Copeland, Sting and Summers talking with each other.
contents_ssm: Andy Summers tuning guitar -- Stewart Copeland warming on drum kit -- Summers talking to off-screen crew -- Sting enters rehearsal space greeting crew, Summers and Copeland -- Roxanne (The Police) -- Message in a bottle (The Police) -- I'll be watching you (The Police) -- Copeland, Sting and Summers talking with each other.
